document_data.name: Thauntle's Good Heels and Soles
document_data.location: [[South Ward of Waterdeep|South Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]{{cite web/Waterdeep News/South Ward Cobbler Finds Rubies}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Thauntle's Good Heels and Soles''' was a cobbler shop on the north side of [[Olaim's Cut]] in the [[South Ward of Waterdeep|South Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned and run by [[Dharjamyn Thauntle]].
